title: Fix transparent grave card overlay issue

requirements.text: Add an opaque background to the grave detail card modal (GraveDetailCard component) to prevent underlying page content from showing through. The card should have a solid backdrop that completely blocks visibility of text and elements behind it.

quotes: wizytówka jest prześwietlona - przebija tekst z innej strony, mam wrażenie jakbym patrzył przez szybę

acceptanceCriteria: When clicking on a grave tile in the map view, the detail card displays with a fully opaque background
When clicking on a grave in the search results, the detail card displays with a fully opaque background
No text or elements from the underlying page are visible through the card
The card content (grave location, status, deceased persons) is clearly readable without transparency issues

constraints: Do not modify the GraveDetailCard component's data structure or props interface
Maintain existing modal behavior and close functionality
Keep the current content layout and information display unchanged
nonGoals: Changing the card's visual design beyond fixing the transparency
Modifying the grave tile map appearance
